name: necromancy diplomacy weaken
description: Weaken the sencondry skills (Necromancy, Diplomacy) & combined treasures (Cloak of the Undead King, Diplomat's Cloak & VCMI Enhancement Shield).
author: bakaczh

chinese.name: 削弱招魂、外交，VCMI增强盾等
chinese.description: 削弱辅助技能（招魂术、外交术）和组合宝物（鬼王斗篷、外交官斗篷、VCMI增强盾）。
